ã€é“¾æ¥ã€‘https://quick-bench.com/q/ctDLCeIqzoycLX9KUuBajAapaUA ä»£ç  123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;constexpr { std::vector<std::string> str_vec; str_vec.reserve(SIZE); for (int i = 0; i < SIZE; i++) { str_vec.push_back(std::to_string(i)); } return 0;}static void PushOneByOne(benchmark::State& state) { // posts.title: [databend] pivot æ”¯æŒ subquery
posts.text: 1 ä»»åŠ¡èƒŒæ™¯ Issueï¼šhttps://github.com/databendlabs/databend/issues/16556 PRï¼šhttps://github.com/databendlabs/databend/pull/16631 1.1 ä»»åŠ¡ä»‹ç» ç›®å‰ databend ä¸­çš„ pivot å’Œ unpivot ä¸æ”¯æŒ FROM/IN + subqueryã€‚â†’ æ–‡æ¡£é“¾æ¥ è¦æ±‚å®ç°ç±»ä¼¼äº snowflake çš„è¯­æ³•ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è®© pivot æ”¯æŒ FROM/IN + subqueryï¼Œunpivot æ”¯æŒ FROM + subqueryã€‚â†’ æ–‡æ¡£é“¾æ¥ databend PIVOT è¯­æ³• SELECT ...FROM ... PIVOT ( <aggregate_function> ( <pivot_column> ) FOR <value_column> IN ( <pivot_value_1> [ , <pivot_value_2> ... ] ) )[ ... ] <aggregate_function>ï¼šç”¨äºç»„åˆæ¥è‡ªpivot_columnçš„åˆ†ç»„å€¼çš„èšåˆå‡½æ•°ã€‚ <pivot_column>ï¼šå°†ä½¿ç”¨æŒ‡å®šçš„<aggregate_function>è¿›è¡Œèšåˆçš„åˆ—ã€‚ <value_column>ï¼šå…¶å”¯ä¸€å€¼å°†åœ¨æ—‹è½¬ç»“æœé›†ä¸­æˆä¸ºæ–°åˆ—çš„åˆ—ã€‚ <pivot_value_N>ï¼šæ¥è‡ª<value_column>çš„å”¯ä¸€å€¼ï¼Œå°†åœ¨æ—‹è½¬ç»“æœé›†ä¸­æˆä¸ºæ–°åˆ—ã€‚ databend UNPIVOT è¯­æ³• SELECT ...FROM ... UNPIVOT ( <value_column> FOR <name_column> IN ( <column_list> ) )[ ... ] <value_column>ï¼šå°†å­˜å‚¨ä» <column_list> ä¸­åˆ—å‡ºçš„åˆ—ä¸­æå–çš„å€¼çš„åˆ—ã€‚ <name_column>ï¼šå°†å­˜å‚¨ä»ä¸­æå–å€¼çš„åˆ—çš„åç§°çš„åˆ—ã€‚ <column_list>ï¼šè¦å–æ¶ˆé€è§†çš„åˆ—çš„åˆ—è¡¨ï¼Œç”¨é€—å·åˆ†éš”ã€‚ snowflake PIVOT è¯­æ³• 123456789101112SELECT ...FROM ... PIVOT ( <aggregate_function> ( <pivot_column> ) FOR <value_column> IN ( <pivot_value_1> [ , <pivot_value_2> ... ] | ANY [ ORDER BY ... ] | <subquery> ) [ DEFAULT ON NULL (<value>) ] )[ ... ] snowflake UNPIVOT è¯­æ³• SELECT ...FROM ... UNPIVOT [ { INCLUDE | EXCLUDE } NULLS ] ( <value_column> FOR <name_column> IN ( <column_list> ) )[ ... ] 1.2 ä»‹ç» pivot & unpivot 1.2.1 pivotï¼ˆé€è§†ï¼Œä¸€åˆ—ä¸­çš„å±æ€§å€¼è½¬æˆå¤šä¸ªå¯¹åº”å±æ€§ï¼‰ https://docs.databend.com/sql/sql-commands/query-syntax/query-pivot PIVOTæ“ä½œé€šè¿‡æ—‹è½¬è¡¨æ ¼å¹¶åŸºäºæŒ‡å®šåˆ—èšåˆç»“æœæ¥è½¬æ¢è¡¨æ ¼ï¼Œè¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹äºæ€»ç»“å’Œåˆ†æå¤§é‡æ•°æ®ä»¥æ›´å¯è¯»æ ¼å¼æ˜¾ç¤ºéå¸¸æœ‰ç”¨çš„æ“ä½œã€‚ databend PIVOT è¯­æ³• SELECT ...FROM ...
